improvements: Reduce 'Clarity' or 'Structure' settings by 15-20% to eliminate the unnatural white halos visible around the dark cloud edges and horizon.
Desaturate the blue and cyan channels by 10% to make the water tone look more natural against the warm sunset light.
Lower the black point (crush the blacks) slightly to remove image noise in the foreground silhouettes and make them crisp solid shapes.
Crop 5-10% from the top of the frame to adhere closer to the rule of thirds, placing the horizon line slightly higher.
critiques.notes: The image captures a beautiful atmospheric moment with striking sun rays and well-positioned subjects. However, the heavy post-processing results in visible HDR artifacts (halos) and slightly oversaturated colors that detract from the natural mood.

improvements: Straighten the horizon by approximately +0.5° clockwise to level the waterline.
Recover highlights in the sky by reducing highlights ~30% and whites ~10% to preserve cloud detail around the sun.
Lift shadows in the foreground silhouettes slightly (increase shadows ~15%) while keeping blacks deep (decrease blacks ~5%) to maintain silhouette shape without losing detail.
Crop ~10% from the bottom to reduce the heavy dark foreground and place the horizon closer to the lower third.
critiques.notes: Strong golden-hour mood with dramatic cloud texture and pleasing silhouettes, but the sky is slightly blown near the sun and the horizon feels a touch off-level. Improving highlight control, subtle shadow shaping, and a tighter crop will increase clarity and balance while keeping the cinematic atmosphere.

However, the heavy post-processing results in visible HDR artifacts (halos) and slightly oversaturated colors that detract from the natural mood. | [OPENAI] Strong golden-hour mood with dramatic cloud texture and pleasing silhouettes, but the sky is slightly blown near the sun and the horizon feels a touch off-level. Improving highlight control, subtle shadow shaping, and a tighter crop will increase clarity and balance while keeping the cinematic atmosphere.
